    • Uses of Customer in businesslogic

      Methods in businesslogic that return Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Customer CustomerService.getByCustomerId(java.lang.String customerId)
      Retrieves customer Object (if found) by its unique ID from the Broker.
      Methods in businesslogic that return types with arguments of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Customer> CustomerService.searchCustomer(java.lang.String keyword)
      Searches through all existing customers for matching keyword using customerBroker.
      java.util.List<Customer> SearchService.searchCustomer(java.lang.String keyword)
      Searches the database for Customer Objects matching the keyword parameter.
      Methods in businesslogic with parameters of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String CustomerService.update(Customer customerNew)
      Updates exisiting Customer object by matching a newly created temporary Customer object to an existing one.

      Searches for any keyword hits over the Customer table at the database.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      java.lang.String CustomerBroker.update(Customer customer)
